attributes.action: Make it possible for an employer to employ the person they want and not be bound by enforced criteria and discrimination legislation
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: For the small employer recruiting new staff is a nightmare, we cannot advertisie for exactly what we want, "excellent telephone manner" is "discriminatory" but it's what we need in our reception and telephone response areas. "good with figures" and "excllent written English" are two other major considerations for us but we cannot place these points in an advert. If we feel that the applicants age, type or demeanour makes them unsuitable to be part of a specific team we need to be able to refuse their application. We should be able to employ the people we want to employ and not conform to any quotas, or regulation.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
